name: Wolverun
description:
Tigerians want to control the universe and mark it as their empire. Their idea is to cast a mind manipulation spell and strike the moon with a meteor to destroy the world, conjured through their own powers.

Wolveruns and the creatures will lose their ability to transform. The wolf kings are resistant to the spell and it is up to them to save all being by gathering at the lunar mountain, and combine their elemental powers.

_

In Wolverun you play as five legendary wolves that travel the world trying to find each other. Their mission is to meet at the Lunar Mountain to combine their powers and save the moon from a meteor. However, they must dodge obstacles and kill monsters to reach their destination.

Wolverun is a unique endless runner platform game with game modes such as story mode and high score mode. It includes a leveling up system and evolutions of the wolves, such as transformations to powerful werewolves. There will be a range of upgrades for the characters and powerups, which can be collected within the game or bought at the upgrade shop!

With a musical artist that created high quality, suitable and entertaining music and sounds. The graphics of the game take on a cartoony gothic style.
